availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Marshall County, Kentucky, farmer and minister. Calloway County, Kentucky native. Married to Caroline A. Filbeck Nelson.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Marshall County, unknown district, p. 89. Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records â€“ Microfilm (1852-1910), Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives, Frankfort, Kentucky, Roll #994048, Marshall County Marriages, p. 3. Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1958, Nashville, Tennessee: Tennessee State Library and Archives, Roll 32: Tennessee Death Certificates, Weakley County, 1911, number 94760.
